conversations.body_text: Hi if I here nothing back from yourselves I will be forced to ask PayPal for a refund as I had nothing back from yourselves this is the second email I have sent with no response from use. Gary Fleming Sent from Outlook for Android

Hi Garyf03,  Due to a high volume of emails during the peak season, along with a few days of holiday, we sincerely apologize for the delayed response. Please don’t worry, as we will arrange shipment as soon as possible.

Hi Garyf03,    We apologize for not updating you promptly about the shipment. Your package has been delivered. Have you received it? https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510427143736/trackdetails
